page.title: 06PENTRE MAWR PARK
page.content: Pentre Mawr Park is situated near the main A548 road running through Abergele.It has many facilities such as tennis courts - three gravel courts and three grass courts;a crazy golf course ,a pitch and putt course;a rugby pitch,and a football pitch which is often used as a training ground for the local under-fourteen football team and has two children's play areas. There are two small artificial lakes in the park which attract nature-lovers to see the variety of ducks and seabirds.Small fish are also found in the lakes.These lakes are used for drainage purposes and contain a large amount of weed. The park is a popular place for people to walk their dogs among the many Oak,Beech and Sycamore trees.The park was formerly the grounds of
